title: Experiencing a Tech problem? Find the common fixes here!

replies.body: Every time I play in ranked and i'm chosen to ban a champ. I select the champ i want to ban and try clicking the "Ban" button but it never works, then it times out kicks me out of queue and tells me that I have to wait it's done this to me twice tonight and now I have to wait 30 min penalty?? - Can someone tell me wtf is happening?
i was AFK and i got 20 min bans but i have waited for about 40 min and it keeps restarting so i cant even get into a queue

Everything is fine for me i can log in and go into LOL. I CAn search for games its just that when it goes to the champion loading screen before the game starts the screen goes black and it seems to be frozen. I am using a mac and its been working fine untill just yesterday i even reinstalled the program i need help cause i wanna play urf before it finishes pls reply asap

Every time I go on league recently there is a new update that in my opinion, makes the game not look as appealing anymore, such as the new RIOT GAMES log in. Is there any way to revert the log in back to the screens where it looked really nice with either the latest skin in an animated way or the pro league advertising.  Even though I never paid too much attention too it, I would much prefer to have it back, and the collection back too please. Is there any way to revert back to the (personal opinion) better more aesthtically pleasing  screens, and could there be any way to have the in game loading screen changed back to the s5 version to? please

when i logged in it says i'm spectating and i can't open my profile and play the game, then when i received an invite to join a party it says on hold, i tried to restart my client and my pc a few times and it still doesn't work, can someone tell me what's happening?

Seems like it might be some variant of a ghost game. They usually resolve themselves inside of four hours. If it's not working past that, my recommendation would be to run a client repair, and failing that submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I'm having a bug or issue where the RP store won't load. I'm not sure if anyone else is having this issue or not. It seems to be a connection error, as my connection times out. I have not this problem on NA however.

This is the error: Failed to load URL "https://plstore.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/session/new/ " with error "ERR_TIMED_OUT" (-7).
[can any one help me on new version issue, i can't see some of the character
Already tried all the rads solutions a week ago and it didn't work rip me :(.
